The Fry Shack

Where Fries Come to Meet Their Maker

Welcome to the Fry Shack, where you'll get the best French fries in the state!
Take a moment to explore the menu, with our wide range of "vleesekes" and sauces (some of them homemade!).

If you're ever in Antwerp, OH, make sure you drop by. You won't regret it!
